body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, tavernkeeper. Native of Switzerland. Son of Conrad Besancon and Mary Besancon. Married to Josephine Gubler Besancon in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on September 16, 1864. Immigrated to the United States on November 14, 1848. Attended school in Erie County, New York, in 1850. Tavernkeeper in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Tavernkeeper in Jefferson County in 1863.
